Row.Text: [B]Altars[/B] were an important part of [B]Bulgaria's[/B] identity.

Religion has always been a personal matter for the {1_Civilization_Adj} people. But around city altars, crowds gather to share stories of past saints. In these shared stories form a new network of the faithful, that seek to bring their vision to the halls of power.
[B]Catherine[/B] was from the same continent as [B]Bulgaria[/B].
[B]Augustus[/B] ruled the region that would become [B]Bulgaria[/B].
